title: Molag'Bal (An actuall assassin soldier whatever)
body:
Molag'Bal ist stark inspiriert von "Predator". Ihr wisst schon, diese Alien dudes. Er soll ein Assassine sein vor dem es wirklich keinen schutz gibt, kaum counterplay, die pflicht von GA oder zhonyas im lategame und einer der dich IMMER findet... halt wirklich ein gefährlicher assassine vor dem sich jeder adc und mage fürchtet und der  seinem ruf als jäger, als assassine, wirklich gerecht wird. Seine stärken als assassine ... das out of combat ms (über 600), das töten von weichen zielen, das ungesehene bewegen im schatten sind extrem stark ausprägt ... auf der anderen seite sind die typischen schwächen eines assassines bei ihm auch etwas härter. er hat kaum waveclear ohne items ... also...0. er kann nichts gegen tanks machen, er hat es sehr schwer in teamfights . naja, ihr könnt ja mal nen blick reinwerfen ... der name kommt aus skyrim. Ich habe jetzt einfach zeds stats genommen (für ms und ad) ... idk welche stats da balanced wären ... hätte ihn halt gerne sehr verwundbar aber sehr dmg lastig. das ding ist auf english, hoffe das ist kein allzu großes probleme ... aber da jeder deutsche seit mindestens der 5. klasse englisch hat wüsste ich nicht warum das ein problem wäre.

Passive:
20% of his AD is converted into movement speed.{{item:3117}} 

He has a meele and a ranged mode. The meele mode activates once a targett is in his meele range (300). In this range he will use fast knife attacks instead of gunshots.  His non meele range is 300-675.{{item:3094}} {{item:1041}} 

He can buy any item. Steraks will only prock in his meele mode. Runaans will only prock in his range mode, hydra only in his meele (item active can be used whenever), titanic only in meele (item active as well) and so on.{{item:3053}} 

**Q:**
As long as you press the Q button Molag'Bal is invisible. This is a new kind of invisibility, i would call it, "True Invisibility". You can no be seen by anyone, no matter if you stand right in front of someone, if u get hit by an ability (exception f.e. Lee Q) or if you pass a control ward.  The only way to be seen is if you stop pressing Q, if you are exposed to true vision or in enemy's tower range. During this invisibilty he can't use anything else (f.e. sums, item actives, abilities, aa's). If he uses any of that stuff he will stop the invisibility.{{item:3147}} 

His first normal Attack out of the invisibility will slow the targett for 1.5s for 10% (+10% of his total AD) and deal 15/25/35/45/60 extra physical dmg. It will also put grievous wounds oin the enemy for 3s.
CD: 25/18/16/14/12

**If he gets f.e. hooked by Blitzcrank but the player keeps pressing Q, Blitzcrank wont even notice he hit his hook EXCEPT if he has f.e. Ludens (the ludens prock will be visible) or if he hears it and so on. With Thresh it should be pretty obvious if Molag'Bal got hit even when he is invisible.**

**W:**
Passive: While Molag'Bal is not seen by an enemy champions and not in combat he gains +20MS.

Aktive: He charges his weapon with a harpune like bullet which affects his next normal attack (he can keep it unused as long as he wants, the cooldown starts after the use). His next normal attack will deal 10/20/30/40/60 (+2 for each % of crit) physical dmg and connect Molag'Bal to the champion with a chain. The chain will break after 975 (kinda like lb E). BUT if he uses his first AA in his meele range, he will skip he first part and immediately use the  
the second reactivation.

He can reactivate the ability within 5s. 
Reactivation: He immediately closes the gap to the targett (he uses the chain to like get to it) with 950MS. The next normal attack after the reactiovation of this ability deal 20/30/40/50/70 (+95% of his total AD) physical dmg  
CD:20/18/16/14/12

He can also reactivate it before using a first normal attack and shot it as a skillshot with a range of 675. With that he does not deal dmg but can also hit enemies. This skillshot can used on terrain as well, through reactivation he can then immediately jump to the terrain.

_If he throws the speer out of his invisiblity, the speer will also slow the targett and deal the extra dmg from the Q. The Q will not be activated if he uses the harpune as a skillshot.

He can use the chain on minions and monster, not on towers, inhib, nexus. 

The chain can be removed by using a cleanse.
He can prock duskblade in both forms both if he does itin ranged form, it wont slow._

**E:**
Molag'Bal will jump forward and do a  roll. The roll has a range of 500 and can go over some walls. 

He can reactivate the ability to throw a granate (675 range). The granate does magical AOE dmg in a radius 375. If the granate hits an enemy it deals 45/60/75/90/105 (+100% AP) dmg. The granate will also knock back enemies for 300 and Molag'Bal (if hit) for 350. If Molag'Bal gets hit by the granate he loses 10% of his current HP.
CD:18/16/14/12/10

_similiar to ziggs_

**R:**
After activation an icon for every enemy champion will appear (like kindred passive). He can choose one of them. This Champion will be marked (the marked champion  cant see that he is marked). There will be like a red line on the screen which leads to the marked champion (kinda like ww passive). The mark will stop after the enemy champion took damage from Molag'Bal.

The first normal attack or damaging ability will deal an extra 80% of Molag'Bal's AD.

**Full combo could be:**
A full combo which might be: R - W - Q - (Walk towards enemy) - AA (which will bind the enemy and slow 1.5s for 52%) and deal 120 physical dmg  + 150 duskblade + 336 R- W2 which will deal 469 dmg - AA which will deal 420 + 348 physical dmg electrocute - E in front of enemy - E2 to knock enemy into team, towerrange or just beause which deals 105 magical dmg - AA or Q, wait, AA to finish off if neseccary.
_
This will be about 1948 dmg plus about 500true dmg of ignite and some rune damage increases.
